# [Interview #1: AOL Chat 1, Entry #28](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1#28)

#### THopeB

Robert Jordan, thank you very much for joining us in the Writers Club tonight!

#### Robert Jordan

Thanks, everybody, for having me.
